The biomass volume (total biomass), V biomass , was obtained from the experimental total dry biomass and its water content (82%, Vergara-Fernández et al., 2006) assuming a biofilm density of 1.0 g cm−3 (Deshusses et al., 1995). a a was calculated according to Arriaga and Revah (2009) considering the total hyphal length, L hyphae , as follows: (9) L h y p h a e = V b i o m a s s π ( d h y p h a e / 2 ) 2 The total fungal interfacial area per reactor volume, a a , can be calculated as: (10) a a = ( d h y p h a e ) ( L h y p h a e ) π V r e a c t o r On the other hand, the surface area corresponding to nonaerial biomass was approximated to the surface area available from the porous support (not a function of the generated aerial biomass), since only the outer biomass of the monolayer is available for transport. Finally, considering α as the fraction of the total biomass corresponding to the aerial biomass, the superficial area available for n-pentane mass transfer can be defined as: (11) a V = a m + a a ⋅ α Microorganisms and inoculum Fusarium sp. was isolated as described by Arriaga and Revah (2005) and identified as F. solani CBS 117476 by the Centraalbureau voor Schimmelcultures (The Netherlands). Its preservation, cultivation conditions and spore production were similar to that reported by García-Peña et al. (2001).Carbon source and mineral medium Pentane (Merck, 99%) was used as a model hydrophobic VOC.
